title: Love Island's Vanessa Sierra and Adam Farrugia knew each other BEFORE appearing on the show
text:
He chose her on Monday night's premiere episode of Love Island, but it turns out that wasn't the first time Adam Farrugia had laid eyes on Vanessa Sierra.

Video has emerged showing the newfound reality stars out with friends at a restaurant back in May.

Although they weren't seated next to each other, both Vanessa, 24, and Adam, 27, can be seen sitting just a couple of people apart.

Scroll down for video

Going way back: He chose her on Monday night's premiere episode of Love Island, but it turns out that wasn't the first time Adam Farrugia had laid eyes on Vanessa Sierra

The video shows Adam gesturing at the camera, while a smiling Vanessa sips on a glass of beer.

Interestingly, while Vanessa hails from New South Wales, Adam originates from Queensland, but they clearly run in the same circles.

Adam chose Vanessa out of all of the other girls shortly after entering the Fijian villa.

Secret attraction: Adam chose Vanessa out of all of the other girls shortly after entering the Fijian villa

Acquainted: Interestingly, while Vanessa hails from New South Wales, Adam originates from Queensland, but they clearly run in the same circles

Despite their shared history though, Vanessa didn't seem thrilled about the prospect of being paired with Adam.

'He's just got trouble written all over him,' she said, clearly disappointed with her first match.

Their pairing was short-lived though, with Vanessa later trading Adam for Sam Withers, 28.

Inside knowledge: Despite their shared history, Vanessa didn't seem thrilled about the prospect of being paired with Adam

Proving to be quite popular, when Matthew Zukowski, 24, entered the villa, he chose Vanessa, leaving both Adam and Sam dateless.

Adam then went on to choose Cassie Lansdell, 27, while Sam chose Cynthia Taylu, 23.

It's not the first time Vanessa has made headlines, with the Love Island star previously having dated Married At First Sight's Jessika Power's brother, Rhyce.
description: He chose her on Monday's episode of Love Island, but it turns out that wasn't the first time Adam Farrugia had laid eyes on Vanessa Sierra. Video has emerged showing the reality stars out together in May.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
